query:
UPDATE app.api_keys k
                    SET last_used = NOW(),
                        last_used_ip = $1,
                        last_used_user_agent = $2
                   FROM app.users u
                  WHERE k.key_hash = $3
                    AND k.revoked IS NULL
                    AND k.expiry > NOW()
                    AND u.id = k.user_id
              RETURNING u.id AS "id: UserId",
                        u.team_id AS "team_id: TeamId",
                        u.admin
